song_lyrics: He dhanya bhāgya dhanya ghaḍī, ane svāgat karīe āj,
Āvo padhāro āngaṇe, he mārā Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj.
He ānandno avasarīyo mahekī rahyo,
Pramukh Swāmī āvyānā vadhāmaṇā, ho avasar...
Antarno moralo re, gahekī rahyo,
Pramukh Swāmī āvyānā vadhāmaṇā, ho avasar...
Āj ānand chhāyo, mangal-din āyo,
Umang bharī lāyo re... ānand chhāyo re...
Bahu sāj sajāyo, range rās rachāyo,
Ang ang fīrakāyo re... ānand chhāyo re...
Har man harakhāyo, jan jan hulasāyo,
Swāmī tav guṇ gāyo re... ānand chhāyo re...
Jene Swāmī yash gāyo, eno janam sohāyo,
Avasar rūḍo āyo re, ānand chhāyo re...
Prem taṇā pagale Pramukh Swāmīnī kevī ā padharāmaṇī,
Lāge re sohāmaṇī,
He Akṣhar āvyānī vadhāmaṇī re,
Pramukh Swāmīnī vadhāmaṇī, prem taṇā...
Bhītarnī ānand bharatīmā brahma-nādnī laheru gāje,
Pancham sūr paramānand sāthe, zānz pakhāvaj bāje,
He harakhnī helī rome rome mārā relī,
Mārā antar tāp mīṭāvanī,
Mūrat lāge re sohāmaṇī... prem taṇā..
He... rangnī zaḍī ānandnī ghaḍī,
Pramukh Swāmī padhāryā dhanya ghaḍī,
Mārā Swāmī padhāryā dhanya ghaḍī,
Mārā vā’lā padhāryā dhanya ghaḍī,
Āvo āvo lūnṭo lā’vo,
Āvo avasar āve na farī farī,
Pramukh Swāmī padhāryā...
He... Swāmīnā nāmnī lāgī re raḍhī,
Ghaṇī khammā mārā Pramukh Swāmī, ghaṇī khammā
Mārā haiyāmā bhagatīnī bharatī chaḍhī,
Pramukh Swāmī padhāryā..
Mārā Swāmī padhāryā...
title: Ānandno avasarīyo mahekī rahyo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1158: unknown

Category: Nrutya Gito
